Description: THIS TASK AGREEMENT SUPPORTS THE MANAGEMENT AND ADMINISTRATION OF EBEY S LANDING NATIONAL HISTORICAL RESERVE (RESERVE), AS AUTHORIZED BY THE RESERVE S ENABLING LEGISLATION (PL 95 625). THE SECRETARY OF THE INTERIOR, ACTING THROUGH THE NPS, MAY, PURSUANT TO COOPERATIVE AGREEMENT  TRANSFER MANAGEMENT AND ADMINISTRATION OVER ALL OR ANY PART OF THE PROPERTY ACQUIRED   TO THE STATE OR APPROPRIATE UNITS OF LOCAL GOVERNMENT  PROVIDE TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE TO SUCH STATE OR UNIT OF LOCAL GOVERNMENT IN THE MANAGEMENT, PROTECTION, AND INTERPRETATION OF THE RESERVE  AND MAKE PERIODIC GRANTS, WHICH SHALL BE SUPPLEMENTAL TO ANY OTHER FUNDS TO WHICH THE GRANTEE MAY BE ENTITLED UNDER ANY OTHER PROVISION OF LAW, TO SUCH STATE OR LOCAL UNIT OF GOVERNMENT FOR THE ANNUAL COSTS OF OPERATION AND MAINTENANCE EXCEPT THAT NO SUCH GRANT MAY EXCEED 50 PER CENTUM OF THE ESTIMATED ANNUAL COST, AS DETERMINED BY THE SECRETARY, OF SUCH OPERATIONS AND MAINTENANCE.

THIS TASK AGREEMENT PROVIDES FISCAL YEAR 2022 FUNDING TO THE TRUST BOARD OF EBEY'S LANDING NATIONAL HISTORIC RESERVCE FOR ADMINISTRATION, MANAGEMENT AND POLICY OVERSIGHT OF EBEY'S LANDING NATIONAL HISTORIC RESERVE. THIS TASK AGREEMENT WILL SUPPORT FOUR BROAD TRUST BOARD FUNCTIONS AS PROPOSED IN THE BOARD'S FISCAL YEAR 2022 OVERALL WORK PLAN: (1) ADMINISTRATION AND OPERATIONS OF THE TRUST BOARD; (2) PRESERVATION - STEWARDSHIP OF RESERVE RESOURCES; (3) PARTNERSHIPS; AND (4) INTERPRETATION - NATURAL AND CULTURAL HERITAGE EDUCATION AND OUTREACH. THIS TASK AGREEMENT SUPPORTS THE PROMOTION, FACILITATION, AND IMPROVEMENT OF THE PUBLIC'S UNDERSTANDING OF NATURAL, CULTURAL, HISTORICAL, RECREATIONAL, AND OTHER ASPECTS OF AREAS SUCH AS ECOLOGICAL CONSERVATION AREAS, AND STATE AND LOCAL PARKS.
COOPERATIVE MANAGEMENT OF EBEY'S LANDING NATIONAL HISTORICAL RESERVE
FISCAL YEAR 2021 FUNDING FOR EBEY-S LANDING NATIONAL HISTORICAL RESERVE
FISCAL YEAR 2020 FUNDING FOR EBEY'S LANDING NATIONAL HISTORIC RESERVCE

THE TRUST BOARD WILL HELP MANAGE AND ADMINISTER EBEY'S LANDING NATIONAL HISTORICAL RESERVE IN COOPERATION WITH THE NPS AND LOCAL PARTNERS. THIS YEAR'S WORK WILL INCLUDE MONITORING SCENIC EASEMENTS, PROVIDING EDUCATION AND OUTREACH, INCLUDING ADMINISTRATION OF THE NPS' VOLUNTEER IN PARKS (VIP) PROGRAM, FACILITATING GRANS TO PRIVATE LANDOWNERS TO PROMOTE HISTORIC PRESERVATION, AND ENGAGING WITH LOCAL GOVERNMENT.
FUNDING FOR TRUST BOARD OF EBEY'S LANDING NATONAL HISTORICAL RESERVE
